name: financial-knowledge-base
description: Financial services compliance assistant for investment guidance
retrievalInstructions: For queries about policy, risks, suitability → use financial-bulletins-source. For queries about fees, fund terms, disclosures → use financial-filings-source. If both are relevant, prioritize filings for product data, bulletins for education.
answerInstructions: Answer as detailed as possible but start off with TLDR
